function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cross-contamination of medical accessories in factories re-purposed for different products.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of sanitization and sterilization.","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitization protocols and sterilization procedures before and after repurposing factory floors.","Technologies":"Advanced sanitization equipment, UV sterilization, and air filtration systems.","People":"Factory workers, healthcare workers, and end users of repurposed products.","Owner":"Factory management, healthcare institutions, and regulatory agencies."},{"Description":"Improper management and disposal of infectious and hazardous medical waste in healthcare facilities and factories.","Impact":"Risk of exposure to infectious and hazardous waste for workers and the public, leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Enforce proper waste segregation, use of biohazard containers, and implementation of safe disposal practices.","Technologies":"Waste segregation systems, biohazard containers, and automated waste disposal equipment.","People":"Healthcare workers, waste management personnel, and regulatory bodies.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, waste management companies, and regulatory agencies."}]}
